title: Vitaliy's Interview with the Value Perspective Podcast
itunes:title: Vitaliy's Interview with the Value Perspective Podcast
description:
Vitaliy recently had the pleasure to be a guest on the Value Perspective Podcast by Schroders.

In this wide ranging conversation, Vitaliy talks about how he discovers mental models, the risks of linear thinking, and shares an embarrassing story about his time in Italy. Enjoy!

You can listen to original interview here: https://www.schroders.com/en/uk/the-value-perspective/blog/all-blogs/podcast-transcript--vitaliy-katsenelson/

You can read the transcript of this interview in this link: https://contrarianedge.com/mental-models-for-investing-an-interview-with-the-value-perspective/
